alternate_names: Zak Tor Adebanwo Sten Arogundade Gaterud

description.plain:
Zak Arogundade Gaterud (born 23 October 1994), professionally known as Ecco2k (also stylised as Ecco2K and ECCO2K), is a recording artist and record producer. He was born in London, England, but moved to Sweden when he was two years old.

Ecco is a member of the musical collective Drain Gang, also known as Shield Gang or Gravity Boys and is closely affiliated with Yung Lean and Sad Boys. Even though he is definitive within the group, his style is mysterious, due to the limited number of tracks he has released.

His debut album E was released on November 27, 2019, after teasing it since 2014—an experimental set of songs executively produced by a close friend and longtime collaborator Gud.

He is a former designer for the Swedish label and cult footwear brand Eytys.

name: Ecco2k

body.plain:
Zak Arogundade Gaterud (born 23 October 1994), professionally known as Ecco2k (also stylised as Ecco2K and ECCO2K), is a recording artist and record producer. He was born in London, England, but moved to Sweden when he was two years old.

Ecco is a member of the musical collective Drain Gang, also known as Shield Gang or Gravity Boys and is closely affiliated with Yung Lean and Sad Boys. Even though he is definitive within the group, his style is mysterious, due to the limited number of tracks he has released.

His debut album E was released on November 27, 2019, after teasing it since 2014—an experimental set of songs executively produced by a close friend and longtime collaborator Gud.

He is a former designer for the Swedish label and cult footwear brand Eytys.

songs.title: Calcium

description.plain: On “Calcium” Ecco sings about feeling weak, longing for a lost love and drugs (specifically Ketamine), one of the less experimental songs on the album.

songs.title: Peroxide

description.plain:
“Peroxide” is the second track on Ecco’s debut album E, originally previewed live in mid-2019, the snippet caused a large portion of Ecco’s fanbase to become excited and anticipate an album. The snippet version is faster than the one that was released with the album, likely for set BPM purposes.

Ecco expresses how he feels like an outsider on “Peroxide”, like in his recent interview with Vogue where he stated:

People have always looked at me,

Likely in reference to how he grew up in Sweden, a predominantly white country, he is mixed-race, meaning he would have looked different to the majority of people around him.

The music video for this song released on January 29th, 2020. The video features Ecco on a dinghy out at sea in a wind farm, this could be in reference to the themes of isolation in the song. He also wears the same wig he wore when he first performed the song live.

The music video for this song released on January 29th, 2020. The video features Ecco on a dinghy out at sea in a wind farm, this could be in reference to the themes of isolation in the song. He also wears the same wig he wore when he first performed the song live.

songs.title: AAA Powerline

description.plain:
“AAA Powerline” is the first single released from Ecco2k’s 2019 album E.

Featuring experimental, electronic production from Shanti, the song features Ecco almost chanting a chorus throughout the whole song to create a very open feeling.

songs.title: Fragile

description.plain: Fragile is one of the slower songs on E. This dreamy melody is Ecco’s reflection on his personal feelings about himself and the world, revealing his fragility and vulnerability.

songs.embed_content: Read “Fragile” by Ecco2k on Genius

songs.full_title: Play Em Like Atari by Ecco2k
songs.title: Play Em Like Atari

description.plain: This song was released as a 56-second snippet in March of 2013. The official full-length cdq version of the song was never released, those who have spoken to producer Yung Sherman have claimed he said the file of the song was corrupted and thus lost forever- however, this may be an excuse to not release the song. Some speculate Ecco won’t release the song as it “no longer fits his current style”, although the true reason is unknown. It has since then been “leaked” as the full song plays in the background of a modelling shoot Ecco did for VFiles. This version is, however, low-quality, leaving many of the lyrics still unknown.

songs.title: Sugar & Diesel

description.plain:
Track 8 on Ecco2k’s debut album E, “Sugar & Diesel”.
Produced by long-time collaborator Whitearmor.

This track consistently references the normalisation of drug abuse.

And all I wanna be is truly happy
Baby, hold me down forever like gravity

Smokin' on Aloe from the Garden of Eden

All I wanna see is 1080p

And all I wanna be is truly happy
Baby, hold me down forever like gravity

songs.lyrics:
GT-R Lyrics[Chorus]
In the street and I'm drifting like a GT-R
I don't speak at all, guess we need to talk
Barb wire and alarms all around the yard
The city's never dark but I'm seeing stars
Walking out the mall, scarlet Louboutins
Handbag Louis Vuitton and it's free of charge
Platinum Visa card, drinking rubicon
Christian Dior charms with some rubies on

[Verse]
They ask me bout my ones and where I got them from
I'm like, "oh my god" I'm gonna lose my calm
Everything you know and love can soon be gone
If I don't get involved, then you can't do me wrong
Bleeding from my palms, dripping down my arms
I didn't mean you harm, I had a change of heart
Thought your life was hard, that was the easy part
If I say I love you, will you play along?
Bleeding from my palms like The Passion
Tracksuit bottoms and they sagging
Drinking crushed ice mixed with Vanish
And it made me disappear like magic
In the wonderland, feel like Alice (feel like Alison)
I'm thinking let's go do some damage (let's go damage them)
I got plastic bags full of acid (tastes like medicine)
Whatever happens, happens
[Chorus]
In the street and I'm drifting like a GT-R
I don't speak at all, guess we need to talk
Barb wire and alarms all around the yard
The city's never dark but I'm seeing stars
Walking out the mall, scarlet Louboutins

songs.title: Black Boy

description.plain:
“Black Boy” is the second track on Drain Gang’s collaborative album D&G.

The song shows ECCO2K engaging in an inner dialogue and talking to himself. He is the “lil black boy” that he speaks of.
Perhaps he is talking to his younger self and trying to give younger Ecco some advice.

songs.embed_content: Read “Black Boy” by Ecco2k on Genius

body.plain:
“Black Boy” is the second track on Drain Gang’s collaborative album D&G.

The song shows ECCO2K engaging in an inner dialogue and talking to himself. He is the “lil black boy” that he speaks of.
Perhaps he is talking to his younger self and trying to give younger Ecco some advice.

songs.lyrics:
TranslationsРусскийBlack Boy Lyrics[Intro]
Hey lil' black boy
Hey lil' black boy

[Chorus]
Hey lil' black boy (Hey lil' black boy)
Dreads and makeup (Dreads and makeup)
Where'd your head go? (Where'd your head go?)
Wake yourself up (Wake yourself up)
Brave lil' black kid (Brave lil' black kid)
Braids and black ones (Braids and black ones)
Wasted, burned out (Wasted, burned out)
Chasing the sun (Chasing the sun)
[Verse]
No joke this time, I'm really ghosting
Yeah, he's got Margielas but he's still posing
I woke up sober, now I'm J.K. Rowling
I'll wake up soulless one day, I just know it
I only have one heart and it's still broken
But if I give it to you would you hold it?
And if it went missing then would you notice?
And would you kiss me if I gave you roses?
Why are you afraid? Why are you afraid?
Wake up with no face, who am I today?
Why are you afraid? What are you afraid of?
Look the other way, uh, you're all the same
Don't let it escape (Don't let it escape)
You gotta kill that snake (You gotta kill that snake)
Feel like RS-68s (Like RS-68s)
Burn out and get wasted

[Chorus]
Hey lil' black boy (Hey lil' black boy)
